Uses of Package
com.freedomotic.bus

  • Packages that use com.freedomotic.bus

  • Classes in com.freedomotic.bus used by com.freedomotic.api 
    Class and Description
    BusConsumer
    Interface for bus messages consumers implementations
    BusMessagesListener
    MessageListener implementation (former AbstractBusConnector class) Receives an ObjectMessage (it can be an event or a command) and sends it to his BusConsumer This is the bus hook for any BusConsumer that should register itself in this listener.
    BusService
    Bus services interface Provides convenience methods for sending (also replying) messages.
  • Classes in com.freedomotic.bus used by com.freedomotic.app 
    Class and Description

    Interface for bus messages consumers implementations
